name: Slime Combine!
description: You are a slime, with the special ability to combine with other slimes! Ratnir, The Slime Slayer, has been sent to exterminate you and your kin. Will you combine with your slime friends, and grow strong enough to defeat your foe? Or will you use them as a distraction while you find another means to win? The choice is yours, but whatever you do, don't stray too far from the Slime Hive Mind, as it's the source of all of your power!
